tha-ap538:7.4: cariyaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ → pasannanayanānanaṃ (bj) | pinasampannavekkhaṇaṃ (s2, s3) | pīṇaṃsaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap538:18.3: Suppārapaṭṭanavaraṃ → suppārakaṃ paṭṭanavaraṃ (s2, s3) | suppārapaṭṭanam varaṃ (pts1) | suppādapaṭṭanavaraṃ (c1)
tha-ap538:26.2: Sadā jinaṃ passāmi vimalānanaṃ → parājinaṃ passāmi kamalānanaṃ (mr)
tha-ap538:29.2: pācayantaṃ pītākaraṃ → bhājayantaṃ viyāmataṃ (bj) | jotayantaṃ idhāmataṃ (s2, s3) | bhājayantaṃ idāmataṃ (pts1)
tha-ap538:40.3: Gatāyuṃ sukkhakilesaṃ → gatāyusaṃ gataklesaṃ (bj) | gatāyusaṃ gataklesañ (pts1) | tadāyu saṅkatālesaṃ (mr)
